description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price ("C") for the USD/CAD candle for the final daily candle on the date specified (ET) in the title is higher than the close price for the final daily candle on the prior trading day once information is finalized for both specified dates. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

Data for a given candle will be considered finalized once the next candle appears on the specified graph. The last trading day of the week will be considered finalized once the market closes on that day, typically at 5 PM ET on Friday.

This market's resolution will be based solely on information from the "C" figure located at the top of the USD/CAD Streaming Chart on Investing.com for the specified currency pair (https://www.investing.com/currencies/usd-cad-chart).
